content: this breezy lightweight cardigan is perfect for summer it s an easy beginner-friendly project you can make today from just two crocheted rectangles if you ve never crocheted a garment before this is the perfect place to start click here for the free written pattern and video tutorial 1 **or you can purchase a large-print ad-free printable pdf version of the pattern by clicking the buy now button above ** **pdf version includes ** 5 pages of instructions 24 instructional photos printer-friendly version without photos **skill level ** advanced beginner sizing follows the craft yarn council s standards for women s sizes #sizeinclusive - this sweater is designed to be over-sized and loose-fitting sizes are combined into size groups - instructions and yarn requirements for size 1 are given outside the parentheses with size 2 and size 3 given inside the parentheses like this size 1 size 2 size 3 to choose a size measure around the fullest part of the bust **size 1 ** fits sizes x-small small and medium 30 - 38 or 76 cm - 97 cm bust **size 2 ** fits sizes large x-large and 2x 40 - 50 or 102 cm - 127 cm bust **size 3 ** fits sizes 3x 4x and 5x 52 - 62 or 132 cm - 158 cm bust **finished bust ** 45 57 69 or 114 cm 145 cm 175 cm **finished length ** 23 24 25 or 58 cm 61 cm 63 5 cm **you will need ** approx 450 600 750 yards of #4 worsted weight yarn i used red heart super saver ombre 1 2 2 skeins us size l 8 0 mm crochet hook scissors measuring tape yarn needle or blunt tapestry needle **this pattern is intended for your personal use only you may not share it copy it sell it give it away or mass-produce the finished product however you may sell the finished items on a small scale as long as you convey in your item description that you used a yay for yarn pattern yay for yarn copyright© 2019 current all patterns and photos are owned by yay for yarn ** 1 https //yayforyarn com/seafoam-cardigan-crochet-pattern/
